amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to authorize, permit, or conduct geological or geophysical activities in support of oil, gas, or methane hydrate exploration and development in the Atlantic.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A083) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 236 (Roll no. 465).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A083) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 236 (Roll no. 465).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A083) offered by Mr. Beyer.
